item.title: Combating the Corona slump
item.description: The world is in shambles, with Italy on total lockdown and New York City surely to follow suit in the next few days. With the prospect of working from home for the foreseeable future on the horizon, what better time to hunker down and finally start that blog that I’ve been putting off writing for forever!?
